ygData.subject: Re: Couple of things.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Heya, I m a level 18 drow warrior on Sol. Ro, and I also have a level 19 druid char.  I could really use a set of bronze plate if you were willing to sell
ygData.messageBody:
"Zwanenburg, John" wrote:
>
> From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
>
> Hey vash,
>
> You are on sol ro right? what would you say about a full set of bronze
> plate? And no this isnt a joke...ive got 3 sets...one im using, one in bank
> and other extra on my char....i get them off stuff i kill....and i dont need
> them.


Heya, I'm a level 18 drow warrior on Sol. Ro, and I also have a level 19
druid char. I could really use a set of bronze plate if you were
willing to sell it for a reasonable price. If you remember back in the
late teens in level, cash is sorta tight. I also played in beta on The
Rathe server as a druid and got my char up to 19 in p4.

Thanks much!

Nick
